content: the joy scarf is a timeless free pattern every knitter needs in their library it s a simple meditative knit with a slip-stitch edge that adds structure and a neat finish the scarf drapes beautifully and none of the edges curl knit one for yourself and then make joy for everyone on your gift knitting list it s a classic no-purl rib design that looks great on everyone * purchase a kit to knit joy here 1 * **skill level** suitable for beginners who can knit and slip stitches **finished measurements** 80 x 7 1/2 203 cm x 19 cm you can easily adapt the length by knitting more or less row **yarn** the fibre co cumbria fingering 60% merino wool 30% masham wool 10% mohair 300 m 328 yd per 100 g hank 2 hanks in nutkin **yardage** 590 yards 540 meters **needles** 4mm us6 tapestry needle for weaving in ends **gauge after blocking ** 24 sts and 19 row measured over 4 10cm in stitch pattern **advanced techniques** long tail cast on 2 1 https //www alexcollinsdesigns com/shop/joy-scarf-kit 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=sn9cneozolc
